body.name: Wanbasion Japanese Butcher Knife Meat Cutting, Meat Cleaver Kitchen Chef Knife, Professional Chef Knife High Carbon Stainless Steel with Leather Sheath
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 18 mins
FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Premium Steel - Crafted from high-quality stainless steel, the Wanbasion butcher knife boasts exceptional durability, longevity, and strength. the blade provides superior edge retention and sharpness, ensuring easy and efficient cutting with every use. For best results, clean and dry the knife after each use and maintain it properly.

Sharp and Efficient Blade - The blade of the Wanbasion butcher knife is hand sharpened, ensuring a razor-sharp edge with excellent wear resistance. The hammered texture on the blade not only gives it an attractive appearance but also reduces slicing resistance and prevents sticking. The blade effortlessly cuts through steak, meat, and vegetables with precision and ease.

Superior Control - The ergonomic bending design of the butcher knife top oak wood handle provides excellent comfort and a secure grip. Additionally, a precision, laser-carved index finger hole on the blade ensures superior control and dexterity when cutting.

Comfortable and Durable Handle - The upgraded handle of the Wanbasion handmade butcher knife is made of wood, a sturdy and durable wood material. The handle offers a comfortable grip and prevents slipping, even when wearing thick gloves. Unlike welded handles, the seamless handle design ensures long-term use without breakage.

Convenient Belt Sheath - The quality leather sheath protects the blade during storage and transport, and can be easily attached to a belt for convenient carrying when camping or outdoor activities. The Wanbasion butcher knife knife is perfect for slicing, dicing, and mincing meat, fish, vegetables, fruits, and more, making it a practical and essential tool for both indoor and outdoor use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice knife for cutting meat

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this Cleaver
reviews.reviewText: Heavy, sharp, looks great, washes easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am with this knife. It has good weight, it fits the hand well and is well balanced. I wanted a good knife for skinning large game and this one is a winner. It holds an edge reasonably well. As for the sheath, throw it in the garbage. It is useless. The manufacture could save money by not even including it. Overall, I am impressed with the knife itself. So impressed, I bought a second one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Bought for a cheap line knife for the kitchen staff. Surprisingly durable, been dropped several times and blade and handle are still like new. Comfortable to use throughout a shift, much better feel than those bulky cutting board material handle knives like Superior. Would recommend if you just need a cheap knife that will hold up to a commercial line.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous chef's knife
reviews.reviewText: This knife is easy to manipulate and makes chopping a breeze. It's light weight and sharp, and the hand guard is a nice asset for keeping hands\fingers from accidents.I used it to cut veggies from garden to pickle and it made short work of it.Awesome value for the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome affordable knife
reviews.reviewText: What an awesome affordable knife! Razor sharp out of the box. Love the finger guard. Knife is well balanced and light weight. Gonna make a great addition to the collection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Gets dull quick
reviews.reviewText: At first, this knife worked well in cutting a few pieces of meat. Then it got dull and unusable.I’ll sharpen it but a waste of time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cheap looking but very sharp.
reviews.reviewText: This was purchased as a gift but after I received it, it looked too cheap to give.. It’s probably not a bad price for it because it is sharp and I like the design. It would have been better for more money to be spent on a presentable box and leave off the cheap sheath. I will just use it myself as a kitchen knife.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Wide blade, comfortable handle, very sharp. The blade is about 200 mm (8") long and 47 mm wide at its widest point. Makes chopping stuff up a real pleasure. It comes in a very posh presentation box, together with a sort of thimble gadget to go on your finger for use as a sort of guide when slicing. Just bought a second one as a present for a friend setting up house!

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen cuchillo,corta bien y es compda ña empuñadura
reviews.reviewText: Me ha gustado todo,corta bien,es ergonómico, comodo y biene muy bien presentado en una caja negra y precintada

Coltello più che onesto per il suo costo, lo uso quasi quotidianamente in cucina per vari tagli proprio per testarlo. Devo dire che fino ad ora ne sono rimasto pienamente soddisfatto, abbastanza bilanciato, peso a parer mio adeguato e la lama, ben dimensionata, sembra non perdere il filo facilmente. Ovviamente, come per tutti i coltelli di questo genere, occorre averne una certa cura. Rapporto qualità prezzo secondo il mio personale parere è decisamente a favore della qualità. Soddisfatto.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For the money I would recommend this knife for your kitchen drawer. I was looking for a general purpose knife at a reasonable price and came across this one. Early days but so far so good. Very well presented in a sturdy box, finger protector supplied as well. Bargain!!!
